Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 by us, reflecting its quality, functionality, and potential impact on your business. We believe it could significantly contribute to your success and enhance your operations. Considering its high value and unique benefits, we're offering it to you at this exclusive price. We look forward to the opportunity to discuss how this product can be a valuable addition to your endeavors. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
